translations.open-source-sovereignty.features_descrip: From your idea, IDEM generates everything: professional logo, brand identity, business plan, legal documents, full-stack web application, and automatic cloud deployment. All powered by 200+ AI agents.

translations.open-source-sovereignty.readyToBuild.des: IDEM is open source under Apache 2.0 with Commons Clause. Explore the code, contribute to the project, and help build Africa's digital sovereignty. Made in Cameroon üá®üá≤ for Africa.

translations.open-source-sovereignty.features.creatio: IDEM generates your complete business package: professional logo, brand identity, business plan, legal documents, and a full-stack web application. Everything you need to start your entrepreneurial journey.
translations.open-source-sovereignty.features.deploym: IDEM doesn't just build your app‚Äîit deploys it too. Automatic deployment to the cloud with your own domain. Your business goes live in minutes, not weeks.
translations.open-source-sovereignty.features.opensou: IDEM is open source and built in Cameroon for young African entrepreneurs. You own your code, control your data, and can customize everything. No technical skills required to start.

translations.about-page.description: Founded in Cameroon with a mission to democratize tech entrepreneurship across Africa through open source AI technology.

translations.about-page.mission.title: Democratizing Tech Entrepreneurship in Africa
translations.about-page.mission.description1: We believe every African entrepreneur deserves access to world-class AI tools without the prohibitive costs and complexity of traditional solutions.
translations.about-page.mission.description2: IDEM combines cutting-edge multi-agent AI architecture with open source principles to create a platform that's transparent, affordable, and built specifically for African needs.

translations.about-page.seo.title: About IDEM | Africa's First Sovereign AI Platform
translations.about-page.seo.description: IDEM is Africa's first sovereign open source AI platform, founded in Cameroon. We democratize tech entrepreneurship by making world-class AI tools accessible and affordable for African entrepreneurs.
translations.about-page.seo.keywords: IDEM company, African AI startup, Cameroon tech, sovereign AI platform, African entrepreneurs, open source AI, tech innovation Africa, AI for Africa
translations.african-market-page.description: IDEM is Africa's first sovereign open source AI platform, founded in Cameroon with a pan-African mission. We're democratizing tech entrepreneurship by making world-class AI tools accessible and affordable for every African entrepreneur.
translations.african-market-page.opportunity.descript: The continent with the fastest-growing digital economy and youngest population globally
translations.african-market-page.stat.label: {$INTERPOLATION}
translations.african-market-page.whyAfrica.descriptio: Unprecedented opportunities for innovation and entrepreneurship across the continent
translations.african-market-page.reason.title: {$INTERPOLATION}
translations.african-market-page.roadmap.title: Pan-African Expansion Roadmap
translations.african-market-page.roadmap.description: Strategic expansion from our Cameroon base to every corner of the continent
translations.african-market-page.whyIdem.title: Why IDEM is Different for Africa
translations.african-market-page.whyIdem.description: Built by Africans, for Africans, with deep understanding of the continent's unique context
translations.african-market-page.advantage.title: {$INTERPOLATION}
translations.african-market-page.cta.description: Start building with IDEM today. Free tier available with 10 credits to create your first project. No credit card required.
translations.african-market-page.footer.text: Made in Cameroon ‚Ä¢ üåç For All of Africa ‚Ä¢ üíö Open Source
translations.african-market-page.regions.central.desc: Cameroon is our founding market and the birthplace of IDEM. We understand the local ecosystem, regulatory environment, and entrepreneurial challenges firsthand.
translations.african-market-page.regions.central.oppo: Growing tech ecosystem in Douala and Yaound√©
translations.african-market-page.regions.west.descrip: West Africa represents Africa's largest tech market with Nigeria leading the continent in startup funding and Ghana emerging as a fintech hub.
translations.african-market-page.regions.east.descrip: East Africa is known for mobile money innovation (M-Pesa) and a strong culture of entrepreneurship, particularly in Kenya and Rwanda.
translations.african-market-page.regions.east.opportu: Innovation hubs in Nairobi and Kigali
translations.african-market-page.regions.south.descri: Southern Africa, led by South Africa, offers the most mature tech ecosystem on the continent with strong infrastructure and established markets.
translations.african-market-page.stats.internet.label: Internet Users
translations.african-market-page.stats.economy.label: Digital Economy
translations.african-market-page.stats.startups.label: Tech Startups
translations.african-market-page.stats.funding.label: VC Funding (2023)
translations.african-market-page.stats.smes.label: SMEs
translations.african-market-page.whyAfrica.market.des: Africa has the fastest-growing internet user base globally, with mobile-first adoption driving digital transformation across all sectors.
translations.african-market-page.whyAfrica.population: With a median age of 19, Africa has the youngest population globally. This demographic dividend creates massive opportunities for digital innovation.
translations.african-market-page.whyAfrica.mobile.des: Africa pioneered mobile money (M-Pesa) and continues to lead in mobile-first solutions, leapfrogging traditional infrastructure.
translations.african-market-page.whyAfrica.spirit.des: Africa has the highest rate of entrepreneurship globally, with necessity and opportunity driving innovation across the continent.
translations.african-market-page.advantages.builtForA: IDEM is founded and headquartered in Cameroon. We understand African markets, cultures, regulations, and challenges because we live them every day.
Local team with deep market knowledge
translations.african-market-page.advantages.pricing.d: Our pricing is 60-80% cheaper than international alternatives, with a freemium model that lets entrepreneurs start for free.
translations.african-market-page.advantages.sovereign: Your data stays in Africa. We deploy on African cloud infrastructure and support on-premise deployment for complete control.
IDEM supports multiple African languages and generates culturally relevant content that resonates with local audiences.
translations.african-market-page.advantages.openSourc: Open Source for African Tech Sovereignty
Apache 2.0 license means African developers can audit, customize, and contribute to the platform, building tech sovereignty.
translations.african-market-page.advantages.support.d: IDEM is committed to democratizing tech entrepreneurship across Africa, making world-class tools accessible to every African entrepreneur.
translations.african-market-page.seo.title: IDEM Africa - Pan-African AI Platform | Built in Cameroon for African Entrepreneurs
translations.african-market-page.seo.description: IDEM is Africa's first sovereign open source AI platform, built in Cameroon for pan-African tech entrepreneurship. Affordable, culturally relevant, and designed for African markets. Expanding across Central, West, East, and Southern Africa.
translations.african-market-page.seo.keywords: African AI platform, Cameroon tech startup, pan-African technology, African entrepreneurship, African tech ecosystem, West Africa startups, East Africa innovation, Southern Africa tech, Central Africa digital, African digital economy, mobile-first Africa, African tech sovereignty, Francophone Africa tech, African startup tools, affordable AI Africa, African cloud infrastructure, African developers, tech entrepreneurship Africa, African innovation, digital transformation Africa
translations.african-market-page.seo.structured.descr: Africa's first sovereign open source AI platform for tech entrepreneurship

translations.architecture-page.agents.content.name: Content Agent
translations.architecture-page.agents.content.descrip: Generates website content, copy, and marketing materials
translations.architecture-page.features.parallel.desc: Multiple agents work simultaneously for faster results
translations.architecture-page.features.expertise.des: Each agent is optimized for specific tasks
translations.architecture-page.features.qa.title: Quality Assurance
translations.architecture-page.features.scalable.desc: Easily add new agents and capabilities
translations.architecture-page.seo.title: Multi-Agent AI Architecture | IDEM - Intelligent Collaboration
translations.architecture-page.seo.description: IDEM uses advanced multi-agent architecture with specialized AI agents working together. Orchestrator, Research, Business, Design, Technical, and Content agents collaborate for comprehensive project delivery.
translations.architecture-page.seo.keywords: multi-agent AI, AI architecture, specialized agents, orchestrator agent, AI collaboration, parallel processing, intelligent agents, AI workflow, agent coordination, scalable AI
translations.deployment.description: From zero-config quick deployments to custom cloud architectures, IDEM offers a complete range of deployment methods tailored to your expertise level and infrastructure needs.
translations.deployment.mode.title: {$INTERPOLATION}
translations.deployment.selectedMode.title: {$INTERPOLATION}
translations.deployment.selectedMode.subtitle: {$INTERPOLATION}
translations.deployment.selectedMode.perfectFor.title: {$START_ITALIC_TEXT}{$CLOSE_ITALIC_TEXT} Perfect For
translations.deployment.archMode.title: {$INTERPOLATION}
translations.deployment.chooseMethod.title: Choose the Right Deployment Method
translations.deployment.docker.description: High availability infrastructure designed to maintain 99.9% uptime for your applications
translations.deployment.monitoring.description: Visualize all containers, track performance metrics, and access logs directly from IDEM platform
translations.deployment.ssl.description: Free SSL certificates automatically provisioned and renewed for all your deployments
translations.deployment.cta.description: Start with our free tier and deploy your first application in minutes. No credit card required.
translations.deployment.modes.quick.title: Quick Deployment
translations.deployment.modes.quick.subtitle: Deploy in seconds with zero configuration
translations.deployment.modes.quick.description: IDEM handles everything automatically. We build your application images, deploy them on our infrastructure, and provide you with a live URL. Your app is accessible at https://[your-app].idem.africa with the option to add your custom domain.
translations.deployment.modes.vps.title: VPS Deployment
translations.deployment.modes.vps.subtitle: Deploy on your own server or ours
translations.deployment.modes.vps.description: Full control over your deployment with two options: deploy on IDEM VPS infrastructure or on your own VPS. We provide you with a deployment script that you execute on your server, and your application is generated and deployed.
translations.deployment.modes.vps.feature1: Deploy on IDEM VPS or your own server
translations.deployment.modes.vps.feature2: Docker Swarm cluster for high availability
translations.deployment.modes.vps.feature3: Complete container visualization on IDEM platform
translations.deployment.modes.vps.audience: Intermediate to advanced users, DevOps teams
translations.deployment.modes.cloud.title: Cloud Provider Deployment
translations.deployment.modes.cloud.subtitle: AI-powered deployment on AWS, GCP, and more
translations.deployment.modes.cloud.description: IDEM connects to your cloud provider (AWS, GCP), creates necessary resources, and deploys your application. Our AI assistant collects your requirements and proposes an architecture aligned with your cost, performance, and scalability needs.
translations.deployment.modes.cloud.feature1: Support for AWS, GCP, and more
translations.deployment.modes.cloud.audience: All levels - AI guides you through the process
translations.deployment.modes.architecture.title: Architecture Design & Deployment
translations.deployment.modes.architecture.subtitle: Design and deploy custom cloud architectures
translations.deployment.modes.architecture.descriptio: Whether you're a data scientist, DevOps engineer, developer, or cloud architect, IDEM lets you design and deploy the exact architecture you need in just a few clicks. Choose from AI assistance, pre-built templates, or total custom configuration.
translations.deployment.modes.architecture.feature1: AI Assistant mode for architecture recommendations
translations.deployment.modes.architecture.audience: Data scientists, DevOps, developers, cloud architects
translations.deployment.archModes.ai.title: AI Assistant Mode
translations.deployment.archModes.ai.description: Describe your needs and our AI model proposes a perfectly aligned architecture. Deploy in one click. Perfect for beginners to advanced users who want robust, optimized architecture in minutes.
translations.deployment.archModes.templates.title: Deployment Templates
translations.deployment.archModes.templates.descripti: Choose from pre-defined architecture templates for different use cases. Customize as needed and orchestrate deployment in one click. Ideal for intermediate to advanced users.
translations.deployment.archModes.custom.title: Total Configuration (Experimental)
translations.deployment.archModes.custom.description: Design your entire infrastructure in an intuitive interface (simpler than cloud providers). IDEM handles provisioning. For experienced users with strong cloud architecture knowledge.
translations.home.seo.title: Idem: AI-Powered Logo, Brand, Business Plan & App builder & Deployment Generator
translations.home.seo.description: Transform your ideas into live applications with Idem's AI platform. Create professional brands, generate business plans, build UML diagrams, and deploy apps instantly. From concept to production in minutes.
translations.home.seo.keywords: AI brand creation, instant app deployment, AI assistant, business plan generator, UML diagram creator, logo design AI, website builder, brand identity, technical architecture, one-click deployment, SaaS platform, startup tools, AI automation, digital transformation, app development, brand design, visual identity, deployment automation, AI-powered development
translations.home.seo.author: Idem Team
translations.home.seo.ogDescription: Revolutionary AI platform that builds your brand, creates business plans, technical specs, and deploys applications instantly. Professional logos, business plans, UML diagrams, and live apps - all generated by AI in minutes.
translations.home.seo.ogImageAlt: Idem - AI-Powered Brand Creation & App Deployment Platform
translations.home.structured.description: AI-powered platform for brand creation and instant app deployment. Create professional brands, business plans, UML diagrams, and deploy applications seamlessly.
translations.home.structured.offerDescription: Free tier available with premium features

translations.pricing-page.description: Start for free and scale as you grow. No hidden fees, no surprises. Designed for African entrepreneurs with pricing that makes sense.
translations.pricing-page.compare.description: Detailed comparison of features across all plans
translations.pricing-page.whyIdem.title: Why IDEM Pricing is Different
translations.pricing-page.whyIdem.description: Designed specifically for African entrepreneurs and businesses. We understand the unique challenges and opportunities in African markets, and our pricing reflects that commitment.
translations.pricing-page.cheaper.description: Significantly more affordable than international alternatives
translations.pricing-page.mobileMoney.description: Pay with mobile money across Africa for easy access
translations.pricing-page.noHiddenFees.title: No Hidden Fees
translations.pricing-page.noHiddenFees.description: Transparent pricing with no surprise charges or hidden costs
translations.pricing-page.faq.description: Everything you need to know about IDEM pricing
translations.pricing-page.faq.question: {$INTERPOLATION}
translations.pricing-page.cta.description: Start with 10 free credits. No credit card required. Upgrade anytime.
translations.pricing-page.plans.free.name: Free
translations.pricing-page.plans.free.description: Perfect to explore IDEM and create your first project
translations.pricing-page.plans.starter.name: Starter
translations.pricing-page.plans.starter.description: Ideal for solo entrepreneurs and small projects
translations.pricing-page.plans.pro.name: Pro
translations.pricing-page.plans.enterprise.name: Enterprise
translations.pricing-page.plans.enterprise.descriptio: For large organizations with specific needs
translations.pricing-page.faq.a1: Credits are used to generate content with IDEM. Each action (logo generation, business plan, website, etc.) consumes a certain number of credits based on complexity.
translations.pricing-page.faq.q2: Can I upgrade or downgrade anytime?
translations.pricing-page.faq.a2: Yes, you can change your plan at any time. Upgrades take effect immediately, and downgrades apply at the next billing cycle.
translations.pricing-page.faq.q3: What payment methods do you accept?
translations.pricing-page.faq.a3: We accept all major credit cards, PayPal, and mobile money for African users. Enterprise clients can also pay via bank transfer.
translations.pricing-page.faq.a4: Yes, we offer a 14-day money-back guarantee for all paid plans. If you are not satisfied, contact us for a full refund.
translations.pricing-page.faq.a5: Unused credits expire at the end of each billing cycle. However, Pro and Enterprise plans can purchase additional credit packs that never expire.
translations.pricing-page.faq.q6: Can I use IDEM for commercial projects?
translations.pricing-page.faq.a6: Absolutely! All plans, including the free tier, allow commercial use of generated content. You own everything you create.
translations.pricing-page.seo.title: Pricing Plans | IDEM - Affordable AI for African Entrepreneurs
translations.pricing-page.seo.description: IDEM pricing starts at $0 with 10 free credits. Starter plan at $15/month, Pro at $49/month. 60-80% cheaper than alternatives. Perfect for African entrepreneurs and businesses.
translations.pricing-page.seo.keywords: IDEM pricing, affordable AI, African pricing, AI platform cost, startup pricing, entrepreneur tools, cheap AI platform, AI credits, monthly subscription, free tier

translations.beta.overview.title: 1. BETA PROGRAM OVERVIEW
translations.beta.overview.content: Welcome to the IDEM Beta Program. By participating in this beta program, you agree to test our AI-powered project management platform and provide feedback to help us improve the service before its general release. This beta program allows you to access pre-release features and functionality that may not be available in the production version.
translations.beta.nature.title: 2. BETA SOFTWARE NATURE
translations.beta.nature.content: You acknowledge and understand that the beta software has the following characteristics:
translations.beta.nature.prerelease: Is pre-release software that may contain bugs, errors, defects, and security vulnerabilities
translations.beta.nature.malfunction: May not function as intended or may fail to function entirely
translations.beta.nature.crashes: May cause system crashes, data loss, corruption, or other unexpected issues
translations.beta.nature.testing_only: Is provided for testing, evaluation, and feedback purposes only
translations.beta.nature.limited_features: May have limited features, incomplete functionality, or missing documentation
translations.beta.nature.subject_to_change: Is subject to significant changes, modifications, or removal without notice
translations.beta.nature.performance_issues: May have performance issues, slow response times, or service interruptions
translations.beta.nature.warning.title: Important Beta Software Warning
translations.beta.nature.warning.content: Beta software is inherently unstable and should not be used for production purposes, critical business operations, or with sensitive data. Always maintain backups of important information.
translations.beta.limitations.title: 3. USAGE LIMITATIONS AND RESTRICTIONS
translations.beta.limitations.content: During the beta period, the following limitations and restrictions apply:
translations.beta.limitations.access.title: 3.1 Beta Access Limitations
translations.beta.limitations.access.content: Your access to the beta program is subject to the following conditions:
translations.beta.limitations.access.limited: Beta access is limited, invitation-only, and may be revoked at any time without notice
translations.beta.limitations.access.quotas: Usage quotas, rate limits, and resource restrictions may apply
translations.beta.limitations.access.restricted_featu: Certain features may be restricted, disabled, or unavailable
translations.beta.limitations.access.no_guarantee: Service availability, uptime, and performance are not guaranteed
translations.beta.limitations.access.account_reset: Beta accounts may be reset, modified, or deleted without notice
translations.beta.limitations.prohibited.title: 3.2 Prohibited Uses
translations.beta.limitations.prohibited.content: During the beta period, you explicitly agree NOT to:
translations.beta.limitations.prohibited.production: Use the beta software for production, commercial, or revenue-generating purposes
translations.beta.limitations.prohibited.sensitive_da: Process, store, or transmit sensitive, confidential, or critical business data
translations.beta.limitations.prohibited.mission_crit: Rely on the beta software for mission-critical operations or time-sensitive tasks
translations.beta.limitations.prohibited.reverse_engi: Reverse engineer, decompile, disassemble, or attempt to derive source code
translations.beta.limitations.prohibited.share_access: Share, transfer, or sublicense your beta access credentials with others
translations.beta.limitations.prohibited.circumvent: Attempt to circumvent usage limits, security measures, or access controls
translations.beta.limitations.prohibited.violate_laws: Use the beta software to violate any laws, regulations, or third-party rights
translations.beta.data_privacy.title: 4. DATA AND PRIVACY CONSIDERATIONS
translations.beta.data_privacy.content: Beta software involves special data handling and privacy considerations:
translations.beta.data_privacy.warning.title: Critical Data Warning
translations.beta.data_privacy.warning.content: Beta software may be unstable and could result in complete data loss. DO NOT input critical, sensitive, confidential, or irreplaceable data during the beta period. Always maintain external backups of important information.
translations.beta.data_privacy.data_deletion: Beta data may be deleted, reset, or corrupted at any time without notice or recovery
translations.beta.data_privacy.no_backup: Data backup, recovery, and retention services are not guaranteed or provided
translations.beta.data_privacy.monitoring: Your beta usage data, interactions, and feedback may be monitored and collected
translations.beta.data_privacy.error_logs: Error logs, crash reports, and diagnostic data may be automatically collected
translations.beta.data_privacy.different_policies: Beta data is not subject to the same security, privacy, or retention policies as production data
translations.beta.data_privacy.data_usage: We may use beta data to improve our services, train AI models, and develop new features
translations.beta.data_privacy.third_party_sharing: Beta data may be shared with third-party service providers for testing and development
translations.beta.feedback.title: 5. FEEDBACK AND REPORTING OBLIGATIONS
translations.beta.feedback.content: As a beta participant, you agree to actively participate in the following ways:
translations.beta.feedback.constructive: Provide constructive, detailed feedback about your experience and observations
translations.beta.feedback.report_bugs: Report bugs, errors, crashes, and issues promptly with reproduction steps
translations.beta.feedback.surveys: Participate in surveys, feedback sessions, and user research when requested
translations.beta.feedback.test_features: Test specific features, workflows, and scenarios as directed by our team
translations.beta.feedback.communication_channels: Communicate through designated beta feedback channels and platforms
translations.beta.feedback.suggestions: Provide suggestions for improvements, new features, and enhancements
translations.beta.feedback.document_use_cases: Document and share use cases, workflows, and integration scenarios
translations.beta.confidentiality.title: 6. CONFIDENTIALITY AND NON-DISCLOSURE
translations.beta.confidentiality.content: The beta software, your participation, and all related information are strictly confidential. You agree to:
translations.beta.confidentiality.keep_confidential: Keep all beta software features, capabilities, and functionality confidential
translations.beta.confidentiality.no_disclosure: Not disclose beta program details, information, or materials to unauthorized parties
translations.beta.confidentiality.no_publishing: Not publish reviews, blog posts, screenshots, videos, or demos without written permission
translations.beta.confidentiality.no_sharing: Not share beta access, credentials, or invitation codes with others
translations.beta.confidentiality.no_public_discussio: Not discuss beta features publicly on social media, forums, or other platforms
translations.beta.confidentiality.additional_agreemen: Respect any additional confidentiality agreements or non-disclosure requirements
translations.beta.confidentiality.return_materials: Return or destroy all beta materials upon request or program termination
translations.beta.duration.title: 7. BETA PROGRAM DURATION AND TERMINATION
translations.beta.duration.content: The beta program operates under the following terms:
translations.beta.duration.no_guarantee: Has no guaranteed duration, timeline, or end date and may conclude at any time
translations.beta.duration.termination: May be terminated by either party at any time without notice or explanation
translations.beta.duration.auto_end: Will automatically end upon general release, public launch, or program cancellation
translations.beta.duration.loss_of_access: May result in immediate loss of access to beta features, data, and materials
translations.beta.duration.cease_use: Requires you to cease all use and delete downloaded materials upon termination
translations.beta.duration.no_guarantee_transition: Does not guarantee transition to the production version or continued access
translations.beta.warranty.title: 8. NO WARRANTY AND LIABILITY LIMITATIONS
translations.beta.warranty.content: Beta software is provided under the following warranty and liability terms:
translations.beta.warranty.disclaimer.title: No Warranty Disclaimer
translations.beta.warranty.disclaimer.content: BETA SOFTWARE IS PROVIDED "AS IS" WITH ABSOLUTELY NO WARRANTY OF ANY KIND. WE DISCLAIM ALL WARRANTIES, EXPRESS OR IMPLIED, INCLUDING BUT NOT LIMITED TO WARRANTIES OF MERCHANTABILITY, FITNESS FOR A PARTICULAR PURPOSE, NON-INFRINGEMENT, TITLE, QUIET ENJOYMENT, ACCURACY, AND INTEGRATION. YOU USE THE BETA SOFTWARE ENTIRELY AT YOUR OWN RISK.
translations.beta.warranty.no_liability: We are not liable for any damages, losses, or issues arising from beta software use
translations.beta.warranty.no_guarantee_functionality: We do not guarantee functionality, performance, availability, or reliability
translations.beta.warranty.no_responsibility_data_los: We are not responsible for data loss, corruption, or security breaches
translations.beta.warranty.disclaim_indirect_damages: We disclaim liability for indirect, incidental, consequential, or punitive damages
translations.beta.warranty.maximum_liability: Maximum liability, if any, is limited to the amount you paid for beta access (typically $0)
translations.beta.intellectual_property.title: 9. INTELLECTUAL PROPERTY RIGHTS
translations.beta.intellectual_property.content: All intellectual property rights in the beta software remain exclusively with IDEM. Your feedback, suggestions, and contributions may be used by us to improve the software without compensation or attribution. You grant us a perpetual, worldwide, royalty-free license to use any feedback you provide.
translations.beta.support.title: 10. BETA-SPECIFIC SUPPORT
translations.beta.support.content: Beta support is provided on a best-effort, as-available basis:
translations.beta.support.no_guarantee: No guaranteed response times, service level agreements, or support commitments
translations.beta.support.limited_channels: Support may be limited to beta-specific channels, forums, or communication methods
translations.beta.support.incomplete_docs: Documentation may be incomplete, outdated, inaccurate, or unavailable
translations.beta.support.limited_training: Training, onboarding, and educational resources may be limited or non-existent
translations.beta.support.no_priority: Priority support is not available for beta participants
translations.beta.transition.title: 11. TRANSITION TO GENERAL RELEASE
translations.beta.transition.content: When the software transitions from beta to general release, the following applies:
translations.beta.transition.auto_terminate: Beta access will automatically terminate upon general release announcement
translations.beta.transition.new_account: You may need to create a new account or re-register for the production version
translations.beta.transition.no_data_migration: Beta data may not be migrated, transferred, or preserved in the production system
translations.beta.transition.new_terms: New terms of service, privacy policy, and pricing will apply to the production version
translations.beta.transition.different_features: Pricing, features, functionality, and availability may differ from the beta version
translations.beta.transition.no_guarantee_access: Beta participants are not guaranteed access, discounts, or special treatment
translations.beta.transition.right_to_discontinue: We reserve the right to discontinue the product without releasing a production version
translations.beta.contact.title: 12. CONTACT AND SUPPORT INFORMATION
translations.beta.contact.content: For beta program questions, support, feedback, or concerns, please contact us through the following channels:
translations.legal.contact_message: If you have any questions or concerns, please contact our legal team.
translations.not-found.the_page_youre: The page you're looking for doesn't exist
translations.privacy.title: IDEM Legal
translations.privacy.subtitle: The information provided here is for IDEM customers and users who have questions about our terms, policies, intellectual property, and compliance.
translations.privacy.about.title: 1. ABOUT
translations.privacy.about.content: IDEM, Inc. and its affiliates ("IDEM," "we," "us," and "our") goal is to make AI-powered project management accessible to all. This Privacy Policy will help you understand how we collect, use and disclose your personal information and assist you in exercising the privacy rights available to you.
translations.privacy.scope.title: 2. SCOPE
translations.privacy.scope.content: This Privacy Policy applies to personal information processed by us, including on our websites (e.g., idem.africa and any other websites that we own or operate), our mobile applications, our application program interfaces, our AI-powered project management services, and our related online and offline offerings (collectively, the "Services").
translations.privacy.personal_info.title: 3. PERSONAL INFORMATION WE COLLECT
translations.privacy.personal_info.content: The personal information we collect depends on how you interact with our Services.
translations.privacy.personal_info.you_provide.title: 3.1 Information You Provide to Us
translations.privacy.personal_info.you_provide.conten: We collect personal information that you provide directly to us when using our Services:
translations.privacy.personal_info.you_provide.accoun: Account information including name, email address, and password
translations.privacy.personal_info.you_provide.profil: Profile information such as photo, job title, and company details
translations.privacy.personal_info.you_provide.projec: Project data including diagrams, business plans, and branding materials
translations.privacy.personal_info.you_provide.commun: Communications when you contact support or provide feedback
translations.privacy.personal_info.collected_auto.con: When you use our Services, we automatically collect certain technical information:
translations.privacy.personal_info.collected_auto.ip: IP address and general location data
translations.privacy.personal_info.collected_auto.usa: Usage data (features used, time spent, interactions)
translations.privacy.personal_info.other_sources.cont: We may receive information about you from third-party sources such as authentication providers (Google, GitHub), payment processors, and analytics services.
translations.privacy.how_we_use.title: 4. HOW WE USE YOUR INFORMATION AND OUR LEGAL BASIS FOR PROCESSING
translations.privacy.how_we_use.content: We use the personal information we collect for the following purposes:
translations.privacy.how_we_use.provide_services.text: To operate and maintain our AI-powered platform, process your requests, and enable collaboration features
translations.privacy.how_we_use.improve.text: To enhance your experience, develop new features, and provide personalized recommendations
translations.privacy.how_we_use.ai_processing.text: To generate diagrams, business plans, branding materials, and other AI-powered insights
translations.privacy.how_we_use.communications.text: To send service updates, respond to inquiries, and provide customer support
translations.privacy.how_we_use.security.text: To protect our Services, detect and prevent fraud, and ensure platform integrity
translations.privacy.how_we_use.legal.text: To comply with legal obligations and enforce our terms of service
translations.privacy.disclosure.title: 5. DISCLOSING YOUR INFORMATION TO THIRD PARTIES
translations.privacy.disclosure.content: We do not sell your personal information. We may share your information in the following circumstances:
translations.privacy.disclosure.service_providers.tex: With trusted vendors who assist in operating our platform (cloud hosting, payment processing, analytics)
translations.privacy.disclosure.ai_providers.text: With AI model providers to generate content based on your inputs
translations.privacy.disclosure.team_members.text: With other members of your team or organization as configured by you
translations.privacy.disclosure.legal.text: When required by law, court order, or to protect our rights and safety
translations.privacy.disclosure.business.text: In connection with mergers, acquisitions, or asset sales
translations.privacy.data_transfers.title: 6. INTERNATIONAL DATA TRANSFERS
translations.privacy.data_transfers.content: Your information may be transferred to and processed in countries other than your own, including the United States and other jurisdictions where we or our service providers operate. We ensure appropriate safeguards are in place to protect your data during international transfers, including standard contractual clauses approved by the European Commission.
translations.privacy.your_choices.title: 7. YOUR CHOICES
translations.privacy.your_choices.content: You have several choices regarding your personal information:
translations.privacy.your_choices.account.text: Update your profile information and preferences at any time
translations.privacy.your_choices.email.text: Opt out of marketing emails using the unsubscribe link
translations.privacy.your_choices.cookies.text: Control cookie settings through your browser preferences
translations.privacy.your_choices.deletion.text: Request deletion of your account and associated data
translations.privacy.your_rights.title: 8. YOUR PRIVACY RIGHTS
translations.privacy.your_rights.content: Depending on your location, you may have the following rights regarding your personal information:
translations.privacy.your_rights.access.text: Request a copy of the personal information we hold about you
translations.privacy.your_rights.correction.text: Request correction of inaccurate or incomplete information
translations.privacy.your_rights.deletion.text: Request deletion of your personal data (subject to legal obligations)
translations.privacy.your_rights.portability.text: Request transfer of your data to another service provider
translations.privacy.your_rights.withdraw.text: Withdraw consent for processing based on consent
translations.privacy.data_retention.title: 9. DATA RETENTION
translations.privacy.data_retention.content: We retain your personal information for as long as necessary to provide our Services and fulfill the purposes outlined in this policy. When you delete your account, we will delete or anonymize your data within 90 days, unless we are required to retain it by law. Backup copies may persist for an additional 30 days.
translations.privacy.security.title: 10. SECURITY OF YOUR INFORMATION
translations.privacy.security.content: We implement appropriate technical and organizational security measures to protect your personal information:
translations.privacy.security.encryption: Encryption of data in transit (TLS/SSL) and at rest (AES-256)
translations.privacy.security.assessments: Regular security assessments and penetration testing
translations.privacy.security.data_centers: Secure data centers with physical and network security
translations.privacy.security.training: Employee training on data protection and security
translations.privacy.security.incident_response: Incident response procedures and breach notification protocols
translations.privacy.third_party.title: 11. THIRD-PARTY WEBSITES/APPLICATIONS
translations.privacy.third_party.content: Our Services may contain links to third-party websites or integrate with third-party applications. This Privacy Policy does not apply to those third-party services. We encourage you to review their privacy policies before providing any personal information.
translations.privacy.children.content: Our Services are not intended for children under 13 years of age (or 16 in the European Economic Area). We do not knowingly collect personal information from children. If we become aware that we have collected information from a child, we will take steps to delete it promptly. If you believe we have collected information from a child, please contact us immediately.
translations.privacy.changes.title: 13. CHANGES TO OUR PRIVACY POLICY
translations.privacy.changes.content: We may update this Privacy Policy from time to time to reflect changes in our practices or for legal, operational, or regulatory reasons. We will notify you of material changes by posting the updated policy on this page and updating the "Effective Date" at the top. For significant changes, we may provide additional notice such as an email notification. Your continued use of our Services after the changes take effect constitutes acceptance of the updated policy.
translations.privacy.contact.title: 14. CONTACT US
translations.privacy.contact.content: If you have any questions, concerns, or requests regarding this Privacy Policy or our data practices, please contact us at:
translations.terms.acceptance.title: 1. ACCEPTANCE OF TERMS
translations.terms.acceptance.content: By accessing and using IDEM ("the Service", "Platform", "we", "us", or "our"), you accept and agree to be bound by the terms and provisions of this agreement. If you do not agree to abide by these Terms of Service, please do not use this service. Your continued use of the Service constitutes acceptance of any modifications to these terms.
translations.terms.description.title: 2. DESCRIPTION OF SERVICE
translations.terms.description.content: IDEM is an AI-powered project management and development platform that provides comprehensive tools and services for modern software development and project management:
translations.terms.description.project_management.tex: Create, organize, and manage projects with AI-powered insights and recommendations
translations.terms.description.ai_content.text: Generate diagrams (UML, ERD, flowcharts), business plans, branding materials, and technical documentation
translations.terms.description.dev_tools.text: Deployment assistance, code generation, and development environment management
translations.terms.description.collaboration.text: Team management, real-time collaboration, and communication tools
translations.terms.description.analytics.text: Comprehensive analytics, progress tracking, and customizable reports
translations.terms.description.integrations.text: Connect with third-party services, APIs, and development tools
translations.terms.accounts.title: 3. USER ACCOUNTS AND REGISTRATION
translations.terms.accounts.content: To access certain features of the Service, you must register for an account. By creating an account, you agree to:
translations.terms.accounts.accurate_info: Provide accurate, current, complete, and truthful information during registration
translations.terms.accounts.update_info: Maintain and promptly update your account information to keep it accurate and current
translations.terms.accounts.security: Maintain the security and confidentiality of your password and account credentials
translations.terms.accounts.responsibility: Accept full responsibility for all activities that occur under your account
translations.terms.accounts.notify_breach: Notify us immediately of any unauthorized use, security breach, or suspected fraud
translations.terms.accounts.no_sharing: Not share your account credentials or allow others to access your account
translations.terms.accounts.no_multiple: Not create multiple accounts or use automated means to create accounts
translations.terms.accounts.age_requirement: Be at least 18 years old or have parental consent to use the Service
translations.terms.acceptable_use.title: 4. ACCEPTABLE USE POLICY
translations.terms.acceptable_use.content: You agree to use the Service in compliance with all applicable laws and regulations. You explicitly agree NOT to:
translations.terms.acceptable_use.prohibited.title: 4.1 Prohibited Activities
translations.terms.acceptable_use.prohibited.content: The following activities are strictly prohibited:
translations.terms.acceptable_use.prohibited.violate_: Violate any applicable local, state, national, or international laws or regulations
translations.terms.acceptable_use.prohibited.infringe: Infringe on intellectual property rights, copyrights, trademarks, or patents of others
translations.terms.acceptable_use.prohibited.maliciou: Upload, transmit, or distribute malicious code, viruses, malware, or harmful content
translations.terms.acceptable_use.prohibited.unauthor: Attempt to gain unauthorized access to our systems, networks, or other user accounts
translations.terms.acceptable_use.prohibited.interfer: Interfere with, disrupt, or impose unreasonable load on the Service or servers
translations.terms.acceptable_use.prohibited.illegal_: Use the Service for any illegal, fraudulent, or unauthorized purpose
translations.terms.acceptable_use.prohibited.harass: Harass, abuse, threaten, or harm other users or third parties
translations.terms.acceptable_use.prohibited.spam: Distribute spam, unsolicited communications, or engage in phishing
translations.terms.acceptable_use.prohibited.scraping: Scrape, crawl, or use automated tools to extract data without permission
translations.terms.acceptable_use.prohibited.reverse_: Reverse engineer, decompile, or disassemble any part of the Service
translations.terms.acceptable_use.prohibited.remove_n: Remove, obscure, or alter any proprietary notices or labels
translations.terms.acceptable_use.prohibited.imperson: Impersonate any person or entity or misrepresent your affiliation
translations.terms.acceptable_use.content_standards.c: All content you create, upload, or share must comply with the following standards:
translations.terms.acceptable_use.content_standards.n: Must not contain illegal, defamatory, obscene, or offensive material
Must not violate privacy rights or disclose confidential information without authorization
Must not promote violence, discrimination, or hate speech
Must not contain misleading, false, or deceptive information
translations.terms.intellectual_property.title: 5. INTELLECTUAL PROPERTY RIGHTS
translations.terms.intellectual_property.content: Intellectual property rights are governed by the following terms:
The Service and its original content, features, functionality, design, code, and all related intellectual property are owned by IDEM and are protected by international copyright, trademark, patent, trade secret, and other intellectual property laws. You may not copy, modify, distribute, sell, or lease any part of our Service without explicit written permission.
translations.terms.intellectual_property.your_content: You retain full ownership of all content you create, upload, or submit to the Service. By using the Service, you grant us a non-exclusive, worldwide, royalty-free, sublicensable, and transferable license to use, reproduce, distribute, prepare derivative works of, display, and perform your content solely for the purpose of providing, maintaining, and improving the Service.
translations.terms.intellectual_property.ai_content.c: Content generated by our AI tools based on your inputs and prompts is provided to you under a non-exclusive, worldwide, royalty-free license. You may use, modify, and distribute AI-generated content for your personal and commercial purposes, subject to these terms. However, we cannot guarantee that AI-generated content is free from third-party intellectual property claims.
translations.terms.intellectual_property.feedback.con: Any feedback, suggestions, ideas, or other information you provide to us about the Service becomes our property. We may use this feedback without any obligation to compensate you or provide attribution.
translations.terms.payment.title: 6. PAYMENT AND BILLING
translations.terms.payment.content: Certain features and services require payment. By subscribing to a paid plan, you agree to:
translations.terms.payment.obligation.text: Pay all fees and charges associated with your account and subscription plan
translations.terms.payment.billing_info.text: Provide accurate, complete, and current billing and payment information
translations.terms.payment.updates.text: Notify us promptly of any changes to your payment information or billing address
translations.terms.payment.authorization.text: Authorize us to charge your payment method for all fees and charges
translations.terms.payment.subscription.text: Subscription fees are billed in advance on a recurring basis (monthly or annually)
translations.terms.payment.auto_renewal.text: Subscriptions automatically renew unless cancelled before the renewal date
translations.terms.payment.refund.text: Subscription fees are generally non-refundable except as required by law or stated in our refund policy
translations.terms.payment.price_changes.text: We reserve the right to change pricing with 30 days advance notice
translations.terms.payment.taxes.text: You are responsible for all applicable taxes, duties, and government charges
translations.terms.privacy.title: 7. PRIVACY AND DATA PROTECTION
translations.terms.privacy.content: Your privacy is important to us. Our Privacy Policy explains in detail how we collect, use, protect, and share your information when you use the Service. By using the Service, you agree to the collection, use, and disclosure of information in accordance with our Privacy Policy. Key points include:
translations.terms.privacy.collection: We collect personal information you provide and technical data automatically
translations.terms.privacy.usage: We use your data to provide, improve, and personalize the Service
translations.terms.privacy.security: We implement industry-standard security measures to protect your data
translations.terms.privacy.no_selling: We do not sell your personal information to third parties
translations.terms.privacy.rights: You have rights to access, correct, delete, and port your data
translations.terms.service_availability.title: 8. SERVICE AVAILABILITY AND MODIFICATIONS
translations.terms.service_availability.content: We strive to provide reliable service but cannot guarantee uninterrupted availability. We reserve the right to:
translations.terms.service_availability.modify: Modify, suspend, or discontinue any part of the Service at any time with reasonable notice
translations.terms.service_availability.maintenance: Perform scheduled maintenance, updates, and upgrades that may cause temporary interruptions
translations.terms.service_availability.update_terms: Update these Terms of Service with advance notice for material changes
translations.terms.service_availability.refuse_servic: Refuse service to anyone for any lawful reason
translations.terms.service_availability.remove_conten: Remove, modify, or restrict access to content that violates these terms
translations.terms.service_availability.change_featur: Change features, functionality, pricing, or service tiers
translations.terms.service_availability.usage_limits: Impose usage limits, quotas, or restrictions on certain features
translations.terms.disclaimers.title: 9. DISCLAIMERS AND LIMITATIONS OF LIABILITY
translations.terms.disclaimers.content: The Service is provided under the following disclaimers and liability limitations:
translations.terms.disclaimers.service.title: 9.1 Service Disclaimer
translations.terms.disclaimers.service.content: THE SERVICE IS PROVIDED "AS IS" AND "AS AVAILABLE" WITHOUT WARRANTIES OF ANY KIND, EITHER EXPRESS OR IMPLIED, INCLUDING BUT NOT LIMITED TO WARRANTIES OF MERCHANTABILITY, FITNESS FOR A PARTICULAR PURPOSE, NON-INFRINGEMENT, TITLE, QUIET ENJOYMENT, ACCURACY, OR INTEGRATION. WE DO NOT WARRANT THAT THE SERVICE WILL BE UNINTERRUPTED, ERROR-FREE, SECURE, OR FREE FROM VIRUSES OR OTHER HARMFUL COMPONENTS.
translations.terms.disclaimers.ai_content.title: 9.2 AI Content Disclaimer
translations.terms.disclaimers.ai_content.content: AI-generated content is provided for informational and assistance purposes only. We do not guarantee the accuracy, completeness, reliability, quality, or appropriateness of AI-generated content. You should independently verify all AI-generated content before using it for business, legal, financial, or other important purposes. AI-generated content may contain errors, biases, or inaccuracies.
translations.terms.disclaimers.third_party.title: 9.3 Third-Party Content and Services
translations.terms.disclaimers.third_party.content: The Service may contain links to third-party websites, services, or content. We are not responsible for the availability, accuracy, content, or practices of third-party services. Your use of third-party services is at your own risk and subject to their terms and policies.
translations.terms.disclaimers.liability.title: 9.4 Limitation of Liability
translations.terms.disclaimers.liability.content: TO THE MAXIMUM EXTENT PERMITTED BY LAW, IDEM AND ITS OFFICERS, DIRECTORS, EMPLOYEES, AGENTS, SUPPLIERS, AND AFFILIATES SHALL NOT BE LIABLE FOR ANY INDIRECT, INCIDENTAL, SPECIAL, CONSEQUENTIAL, OR PUNITIVE DAMAGES, OR ANY LOSS OF PROFITS, REVENUES, DATA, USE, GOODWILL, OR OTHER INTANGIBLE LOSSES, WHETHER INCURRED DIRECTLY OR INDIRECTLY, ARISING FROM: (A) YOUR USE OR INABILITY TO USE THE SERVICE; (B) ANY UNAUTHORIZED ACCESS TO OR USE OF OUR SERVERS OR YOUR DATA; (C) ANY INTERRUPTION OR CESSATION OF THE SERVICE; (D) ANY BUGS, VIRUSES, OR HARMFUL CODE; (E) ANY ERRORS OR OMISSIONS IN CONTENT; OR (F) ANY USER CONTENT OR CONDUCT. OUR TOTAL LIABILITY SHALL NOT EXCEED THE AMOUNT YOU PAID US IN THE 12 MONTHS PRECEDING THE CLAIM.
translations.terms.indemnification.title: 10. INDEMNIFICATION
translations.terms.indemnification.content: You agree to defend, indemnify, and hold harmless IDEM and its officers, directors, employees, contractors, agents, suppliers, and affiliates from and against any and all claims, damages, obligations, losses, liabilities, costs, debts, and expenses (including attorney fees) arising from: (a) your use of the Service; (b) your violation of these Terms; (c) your violation of any third-party rights, including intellectual property, privacy, or other proprietary rights; (d) any content you submit, post, or transmit through the Service; or (e) any willful misconduct or negligence.
translations.terms.termination.title: 11. TERMINATION
translations.terms.termination.content: Either party may terminate this agreement under the following conditions:
translations.terms.termination.by_you.title: 11.1 Termination by You
translations.terms.termination.by_you.content: You may terminate your account at any time by following the account closure process in your settings. Upon termination, your access to the Service will cease, but you remain responsible for any outstanding fees.
translations.terms.termination.by_us.title: 11.2 Termination by Us
translations.terms.termination.by_us.content: We may terminate or suspend your account and access to the Service immediately, without prior notice or liability, for any reason, including but not limited to:
translations.terms.termination.by_us.violation: Violation of these Terms of Service or our policies
translations.terms.termination.by_us.nonpayment: Non-payment of fees or fraudulent payment activity
translations.terms.termination.by_us.inactivity: Prolonged inactivity or abandonment of account
translations.terms.termination.by_us.security: Security concerns or risk to the Service or other users
translations.terms.termination.effect.title: 11.3 Effect of Termination
translations.terms.termination.effect.content: Upon termination: (a) your right to use the Service will cease immediately; (b) we may delete your account and data after a reasonable grace period; (c) you remain liable for all fees and charges incurred prior to termination; (d) provisions that by their nature should survive termination will survive, including intellectual property rights, disclaimers, indemnification, and limitations of liability.
translations.terms.governing_law.title: 12. GOVERNING LAW AND DISPUTE RESOLUTION
translations.terms.governing_law.content: These Terms shall be governed by and construed in accordance with the laws of [Jurisdiction], without regard to its conflict of law provisions. Any disputes, claims, or controversies arising out of or relating to these Terms or the Service shall be resolved through binding arbitration in accordance with the rules of [Arbitration Organization], except that either party may seek injunctive or other equitable relief in court. You waive any right to a jury trial or to participate in a class action lawsuit.
translations.terms.changes.title: 13. CHANGES TO THESE TERMS
translations.terms.changes.content: We reserve the right to modify these Terms of Service at any time. We will provide notice of material changes by posting the updated terms on this page and updating the "Effective Date" at the top. For significant changes, we may provide additional notice such as an email notification or in-app message. Your continued use of the Service after changes take effect constitutes acceptance of the modified terms. If you do not agree to the changes, you must stop using the Service and may terminate your account.
translations.terms.contact.title: 14. CONTACT INFORMATION
translations.terms.contact.content: If you have any questions, concerns, or requests regarding these Terms of Service, please contact us at:
translations.meta.title: IDEM - The Open Source AI that brings African startups to life | AI-powered business creation tool
translations.meta.description: The Open Source AI that brings African startups to life. IDEM is an AI-powered business creation tool: transform your idea into a complete business with strategy, brand, product and application. +200 specialized AI agents,  license, sovereign infrastructure. Built in Cameroon for Africa.
translations.meta.keywords: AI business creation, African startup, business creation tool, open source AI Africa, AI entrepreneurship assistant, African sovereign platform, , specialized AI agents, AI business plan, AI logo creation, AI application development, Cameroon tech, pan-African innovation, digital sovereignty, tech entrepreneurship Africa, African startup tools, no-code platform, low-code development, multi-agent AI
translations.og.title: IDEM - The Open Source AI that brings African startups to life | AI-powered business creation tool
translations.og.description: Bring your startup to life with AI. Transform your idea into a complete business: business strategy, brand identity, product and web application. +200 specialized AI agents,  open source, African sovereign infrastructure. Built in Cameroon for pan-African entrepreneurship.
translations.twitter.title: IDEM - The AI that brings African startups to life
translations.twitter.description: AI-powered business creation tool. From idea to complete business: strategy, brand, product, application. +200 AI agents,  open source, sovereign infrastructure. African, you too can build.
